item.title: Command Issue
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Hi, I’m trying to make this command drop Items from the IDs I Specify in the command. Can anyone help me? This is what I put together…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("####") && playerRights >= 3) { dropItem(ID, absY, absX); dropItem(ID, absY+1, absX-1); dropItem(ID, absY+2, absX-2); dropItem(ID, absY+1, absX-2); dropItem(ID, absY, absX-2); dropItem(ID, absY-1, absX-2); dropItem(ID, absY+1, absX+1); dropItem(ID, absY+2, absX+2); dropItem(ID, absY+1, absX+2); dropItem(ID, absY, absX+2); dropItem(ID, absY-1, absX+2); sM("Drop Party!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
